product_name: WTB Vigilante TCS Foldable Bike Tire - 27.5 x 2.3
long_description: A tubeless-compatible tire for 27.5 in. wheels, the WTB Vigilante TCS Foldable Bike Tire offers an aggressive tread for serious trail riders and enduro racers in all conditions. Square-lugged, open-tread pattern offers stability in loose or wet terrain, while the stiff outside knobs grip at lean angles like nobody's business. Super Track DNA rubber compound is a high-traction, sticky rubber offering solid traction and control in steep, loose conditions. Aramid bead offers great bead-seat characteristics and low weight.
short_description: A tubeless-compatible tire for 27.5 in. wheels, the WTB Vigilante TCS Foldable Bike Tire offers an aggressive tread for serious trail riders and enduro racers in all conditions.
